title: Bipasha Basu wishes huge success for Karan Singh Grover’s ‘Hate Story 3’
text: Bipasha Basu wishes huge success for Karan Singh Grover’s ‘Hate Story 3’ Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Actress Bipasha Basu wishes the upcoming film of her rumoured boyfriend Karan Singh Grover to be hugely successful. 'Hate Story 3' Trailer Review | Zarine Khan, Karan Singh Grover 01:36 Watch the video They should have stopped at 'Hate Story'. But the makers made a sequel and now a third installment is all set to come out. Featuring forgotten faces like Sharman Joshi, Karan Singh Grover, Daisy Shah and Zarine Khan, 'Hate Story 3' has predictably a lot of skin... Recent related news *Actress Bipasha Basu wishes the upcoming film of her rumoured boyfriend Karan Singh Grover to be hugely successful. * Karan, 33, will next be seen in...
